name: The Moonlight Bar
description:
🔍︎

You are a simple bartender, working for the most prestigious bar in all of Los Angeles, The Moonlight Bar. But what happens when you are tasked with working as an undercover detective for a private murder case? 

Find out who killed the infamous vice-CEO of the largest night entertainment company in the city! Three suspects and not enough time, you will have to pick your lines thoughtfully in order to gather the right information. Help solve this unjust murder, and find out what prize is in store for you.

  • This is a short game (~16k words)
  • 5 endings
  • There is a planned update to come in the upcoming few months to make the game more polished looking

Thank you for checking the game out! This was made by a single person for a project, so if you stumbled in here, I applaud you!
